divs: sighting detailsthis occured while i was sleeping, and while i would call it a dream it was more realistic than that, i felt it was really happening and was able to do a reality check and determined i was indeed "really there" but in a semi-trance state, unable to really react or speak. i found myself inside a "craft" of sorts. it was dimly lit, i was standing in front of a series of screens or projectors, like a 360 degree oval room covered in these screens. the entire "world \ universal history" was playing out over these screens. i saw the beginning of the universe, the cultivation and population of many planets, and the subsequent fall of many unfamiliar civilizations. it was though i was being "caught up" on where we are in the universe today. after i saw all this, then i was shown our own earth. it was beautiful, so real i could almost touch it. seeing animals, people, flowers, natural wonders, all so beautiful it almost brought tears to my eyes. and then seeing decay, destruction, a sense of "impending doom" was there, it made me very afraid, i realized that i was being shown, humans are making a big mistake, we are messing things up. i was not one to be environmentally conscious prior to this event. but seeing the world crying out in pain and agony. and having a "guide" or character dimly identifying "her"self to me through thought alone (no words were spoken, but i understood "her" name was "mother eve" and she had something important to do with the orignial population of the earth as we know it, she cared about the earth and wanted me to see this, because "i was ready and of an open mind to accept this message"). she was probably the same height as me (5'3") and though the room was darkened i made out she had blue\green\gray skin and very large black\brown eyes which she fixed upon me very solemnly and seriously, i felt a gravity of emotion and communication being transmitted between those eyes and my entire entity. there was saddness and fear and hope and love but no ill will or any kind of malevolent (sp) or bad vibes. anyways i was shown how all will eventually cease to exist as we know it, but some will survive, there is a "cleansing" going on and things are being done by our very gov't, but i don't remember that part now. the gov't was something to be looked at with suspicion, is all i can gather, not to be trusted wholeheartedly but to be questioned and viewed with skepticism. i was told to prepare myself and my family, to learn about self-sufficiency and radical survival methods, to be prepared for a cataclysmic "shift" of types, and to be open minded and expecting of further contacts. then i feel like i was molecularly swirled in a blender as it were, into blackness, and when i "awoke" it was like "we now return you to your scheduled show" and i was in the middle of a normal dream, which i awoke from and realized i was indeed still in the house and where i had laid down, but i was on my back (not a position i ever consciously choose to sleep in). there was a red light outside the window and the air conditioner was off. when i looked to the window the light disappeared and the air conditioner switched back on. don't know if this is significant or not, as it was a window ac on a "energy timer" but it seemed awfully non-coincidental to me.
trends: There have been 55 other sightings in Gulf Breeze
There were no other sightings in Gulf Breeze on or around August 28th 2006
Summary: "abuduction" being inside a "craft" absorbing a series of multimedia history
